metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45884 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9. drivers/media/dvb-core/dvbdev.c has a use-after-free, related to dvb_register_device dynamically allocating fops.

notes.Note: sbeattie> unfixed as of 2023.01.31 exploiting this vulnerability requires disconnecting a DVB device, which is why this has been prioritized as low.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
